Package matrix.distributionPolicy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TaskSplitPolicy
    This interface defines the protocol for implementing strategies to decide in how many task an arithmetic operation should be divided into.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TaskSplitPolicyMode
    This class defines the PARALLEL_FACTOR based on the mode sparseness of the rows and the number of physical cores.
    TaskSplitPolicyRowSparseness
    This class defines the PARALLEL_FACTOR based on the average sparseness of the rows and the number of physical cores.
    TaskSplitPolicyST
    This class defines the PARALLEL_FACTOR based on the number of physical cores, and the average sparseness of the rows and its Standard Deviation.
    TaskSplitPolicyStatic
    This strategy is defined by a constant value equal to Configuration.CLUSTER_PHYSICAL_CORES * Configuration.GRANULARITY_FACTOR.
